page.title: 03Family life in Cheshunt
page.content: Most people live in newish houses with gardens that parents look after.Families have two or three children and a car which they use for family outings at the weekend.Families where mums work often have two cars.Dads use the car for work.If they leave early they are up first with their children.The children's mums make breakfast usually cereals.Some children clean the car at weekends and dads spend their time on D.I.Y. around the house and mending cars.They often watch T.V. Mums do the work around the house but most children do their bedrooms. The "big shop" is done during the week by mum. Sometimes families have snack food but usually they have cooked evening meals such as meat and vegetables.After dinner children play out or look after the family pets until bedtime.
